text.title: Text Writing
text.desc: Generating articles, reports, and creative content.
text.staticContent: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the way we work and live. From automating complex tasks to providing intelligent analyses, its impact is visible in every field. It assists doctors in diagnosing diseases, optimizes global supply chains, and personalizes education to meet the needs of each student. AI is also becoming a partner in the creative process, opening up entirely new horizons of possibilities...
text.typewriterContent: Artificial intelligence is revolutionizing the way we work and live. From automating complex tasks to providing intelligent analyses, AI systems are becoming increasingly advanced. Modern language models can understand context, generate creative content, and help solve problems in various fields, such as healthcare, finance, and education...

myths.title: Myths and Facts about AI
myths.description: Discover the truth about artificial intelligence and learn facts that might surprise you.

myth1.myth: AI will replace all human jobs.
myth1.fact: AI will collaborate with humans, creating new types of jobs and increasing productivity in existing roles.

myth2.myth: AI is more intelligent than humans.
myth2.fact: Current AI are specialized tools. They do not possess consciousness or general intelligence like humans.

myth3.fact: AI requires vast amounts of high-quality data to learn and function correctly.

myth4.myth: AI is bad for the environment.
myth4.fact: Modern AI solutions are becoming more energy-efficient and help optimize energy consumption.

myth5.myth: AI is only available to large corporations.
myth5.fact: More and more AI tools are becoming available to small businesses and individual users.

myth6.fact: AI can make mistakes, and its decisions depend on the quality of data and algorithms. It requires human oversight.
